title: Senior Agile Coach
description: My work at Centare has led me to many different roles and responsibilities from conducting agile training courses for both internal and external clients, improving courseware, designing new courseware, public speaking, facilitating meetings, and mentoring new coaches and trainers.   As an Agile coach I have helped organizations transform and implement Scrum and Kanban along with DevOps principles and practices.  Along with helping clients, I have managed and help grow other coaches in the practice and was heavily involved in sales engineering, and managing the P&L.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: Trispet Solutions was undergoing an agile transformation and culture shift in order to deliver products to the market earlier and increase quality. As a coach in this organization I helped them see the value of delivering sooner. I also guided them in ways to shift towards newer technologies that would allow them to continue to deliver value and avoid the need to completely stop to do a rewrite.

projects.title: Dojo Sensei
projects.description: I helped facilitate an intensive instruction and coaching session called a Dojo. Teams would enter in groups and spend two weeks immersed in a space reserved for learning and experimentation, while honing their agility skills and addressing problems specific to their technology and their place in the company. As Sensei, I guided them through this process of self-discovery, and suggested technological suggestions.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: Coached and trained Husco's IT Department in visual there work through Kanban, stream lined there work intake process, and coached them through a continuous improvement mindset.

projects.title: DevOps Consultent
projects.description: I helped build the Continuous Delivery and Integration pipeline at Northwestern Mutual.  Helped Northwestern Mutual envision and engineer a pipeline that would support their wide variety of technologies. Part of this involved special customization to support the compliance needs of the organization, as well as the massive number of products.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: I coached and trained them in Kanban and Scrum to help them streamline there development process and visualize there work

projects.title: DevOps Consultent
projects.description: I helped coach and build a Continuous Delivery and Integration pipeline.  Worked with both the developers and they network administrators at KeHE so that they could support the pipeline.  Trained the developers in modern development techniques that complement being in a Continues Delivery pipeline.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: I have helped and continue to help Northwestern Mutual through this process through teaching multiple different training courses surrounding agility and coaching teams, individuals, and their stakeholders through the changes that agility brings to the table. Through this agile coaching role, I have acted as a mentor, coach, trainer and a facilitator in order to demonstrate, educate, and help those I have been coaching take ownership of their work.

title: Senior Software Consultant
description: I worked as a software developer helping orginizations build custom solutions.

projects.title: Senior Software Develope
projects.description: While at Direct Supply, I worked on developing an ecommerce solution.  My focus on this project was new feature development, mentoring team members, developing new ideas to outside the team, and modifying existing development practices to better suit the needs of the company.  I was instrumental in ensuring team members were using test driven development, continuous integration, and continuous delivery practices.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer
projects.description: While working with Henry Schein, I was focused on a web application for sharing products through social media.  Along with the development of the product I was also responsible for gathering and understanding requirements and working with the client to prioritize the work.  I also helped the client with implementing a continuous integration solution to better suit their needs.

title: Senior Software Developer & Team Lead
description: At Cornerstone I worked as a Software Developer and Team Lead. I mentored individuals on the team in S.O.L.D. principles and modern development practice.  I helped organizations implement Scrum along with DevOps principles and practices while on the development team.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer
projects.description: While at DentaQuest, I worked on a service that took in EDI documents in XML format and transfored them in to objects that where then passed into another service.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer & Team Lead
projects.description: While at Badger Meter, I worked on a web application that was used to collect and manage meter information.  The usage information from meters was feed into a billing system and invoices were generated for customers.  Additionally, the meter usage information was used to generate reports that showed consumption data and trends.  While on this project, I acted in a dual role of Team Lead and Architect.  I was responsible for working through requirements and ensuring that the development team had a clear understanding and implemented the feature correctly.  I also helped the team move to adoption of the Scrum framework with the goal of developing a better product for the client, business stakeholders, and engagement of the development team.

title: Software Developer
description: At WennSoft I was introduced to Scrum while  working on a high performing team.  My team was responsible for  rewriting their current product with modern technology.  At the time, traditional waterfall methodology would not work so we  introduced Scrum into the organization and piloted it on our team which later helped roll it out to the rest of the organization.

title: Web Developer & Network Administrator
description: At Hallmark Building Supplies  I was tasked with daily help desk support, along with rebuilding their website.  I also maintained and managed their network along with their servers.
